title: Can the daily number of available ads be limited?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I have implemented Unity Ads into my game and would like to change the amount of video ads shown in it.

sections.title: Cause
content: Users are limited by default to 25 ads per day (on a rolling 24 hour basis) per app. Users are also limited to seeing the same ad only once per hour.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Yes. Please contact unityads-support@unity3d.com and we will configure this for you.
